origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoAPI.get_crypto_info', 'description': 'This function retrieves various types of information about a cryptocurrency including analysis reports, historical data, current price, crypto code, and risk management advice.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'cryptoName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cryptocurrency, e.g., Litecoin.'}, {'name': 'dataTypes', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of data types to retrieve, e.g., reports, historicalData, currentPrice, cryptoCode, riskAdvice.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'cryptoInfo', 'description': 'The requested information about the cryptocurrency.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoAPI.get_crypto_info, 它的参数输入如下: 'cryptoName'是'Litecoin', 'dataTypes'是['reports', 'historicalData', 'currentPrice', 'cryptoCode', 'riskAdvice'].
